member.name: IThumbnailStreamCache.GetThumbnailStream
member.summary: Gets the thumbnail stream. This method is for internal use only and can only be called by the photos application.
member.param: The cache options for the thumbnail stream.
The requested size of the thumbnail.
The actual size of the returned thumbnail.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IThumbnailStreamCache.SetThumbnailStream
member.summary: Sets the thumbnail stream. This method is for internal use only and can only be called by the photos application.
member.param: The pointer to the thumbnail stream.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IThumbnailStreamCache
member.summary: Gets or sets the thumbnail stream. This interface is for internal use only and can only be called by the photos application.
